title: How to get yourself the mythical Hoopa in Pokémon on Nintendo 3DS - Gaming
text: Pokémon fans may want to plan on making a trip to GAME soon.Between October 23 and November 5, select GAME retailers will have the mythical Pokémon Hoopa on offer and it can be redeemed by Nintendo 3DS owners with a copy of Pokémon X, Y, Omega Ruby or Alpha Sapphire. The featured Hoopa cannot be encountered through regular gameplay. It will be received in its confined form but is capable of transforming into the more powerful Hoopa Unbound in Omega Ruby or Alpha Sapphire.The Pokémon is recognisable by its two horns and the golden ring that adorns its trunk. According to The Pokémon Company, its rings are said to have the power to bend dimensions and move objects across great distances.It stars in Pokémon the Movie: Hoopa and the Clash of Ages, which is the 18th Pokémon anime movie and premiered earlier this year in Japan.Pokémon Omega Ruby & Alpha Sapphire review (3DS) Gotta catch 'em all againCheck out our most anticipated games of October, one of many videos in Digital Spy's dedicated Gaming YouTube channel.
